movie.title: The Inn of the Sixth Happiness
movie.title_english: The Inn of the Sixth Happiness
movie.title_long: The Inn of the Sixth Happiness (1958)
movie.description_intro: All her life Englishwoman Gladys Aylward knew that China was the place where she belonged. Not qualified to be sent there as a missionary, Gladys works as a domestic to earn the money to send herself to a poor, remote village. There she eventually lives a full and happy life: running the inn, acting as "foot inspector", advising the local Mandarin. and even winning the heart of mixed-race Captain Lin Nan. But Gladys discovers her real destiny when the country is invaded by Japan and the Chinese children need her to save their lives.
movie.description_full: All her life Englishwoman Gladys Aylward knew that China was the place where she belonged. Not qualified to be sent there as a missionary, Gladys works as a domestic to earn the money to send herself to a poor, remote village. But Gladys discovers her real destiny when the country is invaded by Japan and the Chinese children need her to save their lives.

movies.title: Phineas and Ferb the Movie: Candace Against the Universe
movies.title_english: Phineas and Ferb the Movie: Candace Against the Universe
movies.title_long: Phineas and Ferb the Movie: Candace Against the Universe (2020)
movies.summary: The famed stepbrother inventors know what they're gonna do today. They're gonna rescue their sister from an alien abduction.
movies.description_full: The famed stepbrother inventors know what they're gonna do today. They're gonna rescue their sister from an alien abduction.
movies.synopsis: The famed stepbrother inventors know what they're gonna do today. They're gonna rescue their sister from an alien abduction.

movies.title: The Man Who Walked Around the World
movies.title_english: The Man Who Walked Around the World
movies.title_long: The Man Who Walked Around the World (2020)
movies.summary: The true story of a Scottish farm boy whose interest in blending whisky led to the creation of a global icon. Filmmaker Anthony Wonke explores how Johnnie Walker became embedded in popular culture, and has managed to still be there 200 years later.
movies.description_full: The true story of a Scottish farm boy whose interest in blending whisky led to the creation of a global icon. Filmmaker Anthony Wonke explores how Johnnie Walker became embedded in popular culture, and has managed to still be there 200 years later.

movies.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
movies.title_english: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
movies.title_long: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie (2017)
movies.summary: George and Harold are two imaginative pranksters who make the depressing Jerome Horwitz School a better place. They hypnotize their nemesis, the mean-spirited principal Mr. Krupp. He transforms into the incredibly clueless yet kind-hearted and enthusiastic superhero named Captain Underpants. Even without the mean principal, they discover that having Captain Underpants comes at a steep price. Meanwhile, Professor Poopypants tries to eliminate laughter with the school snitch Melvin, and George and Harold discover that there may be more to Mr. Krupp than they had originally thought.

Even without the mean principal, they discover that having Captain Underpants comes at a steep price. movies.title: Shark Exorcist
movies.summary: A demonic nun summons Satan to a small fishing village, where he takes over the bodies of a great white shark and a young woman. A chain reaction of evil grips the tiny community as shredded bodies wash ashore. A Catholic priest arrives, and he must fight both teeth and temptation on land and sea in order to send these man-killers back to Hell before the tide comes in for good!
